title: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar
description: Bug 7945: When searching for references to this field in external jar, the search results are not selected. This issue is observed in Build 200201151.
OB: When double-clicking on a search result, the first match is not selected.
SR:
1. Open the software.
2. Load an external jar file.
3. Search for references to a specific field in the external jar.
4. Double-click on any search result.
5. Observe that the first match is not selected.
